name: 霍弘毅
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule: In Part B of this course we will continue to develop reading and listening skills by learning how to respond to films and texts in order to produce essays and arguments.  Since the class size is so large we will continue to work in groups, but this can be advantageous since the students can help each other.  In each case the ‘audience’ to be convinced will be the students themselves who will ‘grade’ each essay and argument.  New techniques will be introduced for each group project.
